name: Yorick
title: Shepherd of Souls
lore: The last survivor of a long-forgotten religious order, Yorick is both blessed and cursed with power over the dead. Trapped on the Shadow Isles, his only companions are the rotting corpses and shrieking spirits that he gathers to him. Yorick's monstrous actions belie his noble purpose: to free his home from the curse of the Ruination.
blurb: The last survivor of a long-forgotten religious order, Yorick is both blessed and cursed with power over the dead. Trapped on the Shadow Isles, his only companions are the rotting corpses and shrieking spirits that he gathers to him. Yorick's monstrous...
allytips: You do not need to cast Awakening to regain the ability to cast Last Rites.
The Maiden will attempt to assist you in a fight, so choose your targets well.
You can send the Maiden down a lane alone, be careful though, as she represents a large portion of your combat power.
enemytips: You can cast Smite on Mist Walkers and the Maiden of the Mist to damage or kill them.
Try to thin out Yorick's minions before you engage him, Mist Walkers will die from a basic attack or a single target spell.
You can attack Dark Procession to break the wall down.

riot_spell_q.name: Last Rites
riot_spell_q.description: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Yorick's next basic attack deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and restores {{ f1 }} Health (doubled when below half Health). Last Rites will leave a grave if it kills the target.

When there are three or more graves nearby and Last Rites has been used, Yorick can cast Awakening to raise Mist Walkers from graves.

riot_spell_w.name: Dark Procession
riot_spell_w.description: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.
riot_spell_w.tooltip: Yorick summons a destructible wall of spirits with {{ e5 }} Health around target area for {{ e1 }} seconds. Allies can walk through the wall freely.

riot_spell_e.name: Mourning Mist
riot_spell_e.description: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that deals {{ e7 }}% of enemy's current Health as magic damage (minimum {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})), slows by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds, and marks champions and monsters for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Yorick and his minions are hasted by {{ e5 }}% while moving toward the mark.

riot_spell_r.name: Eulogy of the Isles
riot_spell_r.description: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Yorick summons The Maiden of the Mist and {{ rghoulnumbers }} Mist Walkers. The Maiden has {{ yorickbigghoulhealth }} Health, deals {{ yorickbigghouldamage }} magic damage, and raises Mist Walkers from nearby enemy deaths.

When Yorick damages the Maiden's target he will deal {{ rmarkdamagepercent }}% of their max Health as bonus magic damage. ({{ rproccd }} sec cooldown)

Yorick can free the Maiden reactivating the ability, sending her down the nearest lane.

riot_spell_i.name: Shepherd of Souls
riot_spell_i.description: <mainText>Yorick can raise Mist Walkers with his abilities. Enemies that die near Yorick will sometimes leave a grave.</mainText>

wikia_skill_i1.name: Shepherd of Souls
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Yorick can raise Mist Walkers with his abilities. Enemies that die near Yorick will sometimes leave a grave.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|The Horde:}} '''Yorick''' and the {{ai|Eulogy of the Isles|Yorick|Maiden of the Mist}} can have four total {{as|Mist Walkers|buzzword}} under their command.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: {{sbc|Final Service:}} '''Yorick''' raises a {{as|Grave|buzzword2}} for every enemy [[champion]] and {{pp|3|showtype=true|12th;6th;2nd|1;7;13}} non-champion enemy that dies near him, as well as for every enemy he kills with {{ai|Last Rites|Yorick}}. '''Yorick''' can use {{ai|Awakening|Yorick}} to raise a {{as|Mist Walker|buzzword}} from a {{as|Grave|buzzword2}}.

wikia_skill_q2.name: Awakening
wikia_skill_q2.blurb: Yorick summons Mist Walkers from the graves around him.
wikia_skill_q2.description: {{sbc|Active – Awakening:}} '''Yorick''' raises a {{as|Mist Walker|buzzword}} under his command from each nearby {{as|Grave|buzzword2}}, consuming the {{as|Graves|buzzword2}} he used.
wikia_skill_q2.description2: This ability can only be casted if {{ai|Last Rites|Yorick}} is on {{stil|cooldown}} and there are at least 3 {{as|Graves|buzzword2}} around him.
wikia_skill_q2.notes:
* '''Yorick''' does not need to use {{ais|Last Rites|Yorick}} enhanced attack to cast ''Awakening''.
* ''Awakening'' has no cast time and does not interupt '''Yorick''' previous orders.
* Mist Walkers update their stats when '''Yorick's''' stats change.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Last Rites
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active - Last Rites:}} '''Yorick's''' next [[basic attack]] within 6 seconds has {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}}, deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}, and {{tip|heal|heals}} him for {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|18|12|14|16|18|20|22|26|30|34|38|42|46|52|58|64|70|76|82|formula = 10+2 per level up to 6,+4 per level up to 12, and+6 per level up to 18}} health}}|health}}, doubled to {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|18|24|28|32|36|40|44|52|60|68|76|84|92|104|116|128|140|152|164|formula = 20+4 per level up to 6,+8 per level up to 12, and+12 per level up to 18}} health}}|health}} if he is {{as|{{sti|health|below 50% '''maximum''' health}}}}.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: If there are at least 3 {{as|Graves|buzzword2}} nearby, '''Yorick''' can cast ''{{ai|Awakening|Yorick}}'' within ''Last Rites' ''{{stil|cooldown}}.
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* ''Last Rites' ''cooldown begins on-hit.
* '''Yorick''' does not need to use ''Last Rites' ''enhanced attack to cast {{ai|Awakening|Yorick}}.
* ''Last Rites'' can affect structures.
* ''Last Rites'' has no cast time and does not interrupt '''Yorick''' previous orders.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Dark Procession
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a 1-second delay, '''Yorick''' summons a circular wall of spirits around the target area that lasts up to 4 seconds, which enemies cannot walk through.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: ''Dark Procession'' can only be targeted by enemy champion basic attacks and takes 1 [[damage]] per attack, dissolving after taking enough damage. Turret shots instantly dissolve the wall regardless of its remaining health.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* Allies can freely walk through ''Dark Procession''.
* ''Dark Procession'' will {{tip|airborne|knock up}} enemies away from it on-cast and trigger in-combat effects such as drawing [[turret]] aggro, applying {{ii|Elixir of Sorcery}} and {{ri|Sudden Impact}}.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Mourning Mist
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yorick''' hurls a globule of Black Mist that splashes across an off-centered area, dealing {{as|15% of target's '''current''' health}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all enemies hit, down to a minimum threshold.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: Affected enemy champions and [[monster]]s are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 30% for 2 seconds, and marked for 4 seconds, during which '''Yorick''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when moving towards them.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Eulogy of the Isles
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yorick''' summons the ''Maiden of the Mist'' along with {{as|Mist Walkers|buzzword}}, which remain on the battlefield until she or '''Yorick''' dies.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: While the ''Maiden of the Mist'' is alive, ''Eulogy of the Isles'' can be reactivated to set the ''Maiden'' free, letting her push the nearest lane until she dies.
wikia_skill_r1.cooldown: {{tt|{{ap|160|130|100}}|Begins after the Maiden of the Mist's death}}
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* See the ''Pets'' section below for more details about ''Maiden of the Mist'' and {{as|Mist Walkers|buzzword}}.
* The Maiden updates its stats when '''Yorick's''' stats change.
